The photo was published on Facebook on N: 2. The photo was published alongside another image showing a man burning a Koran at an anti-Islam protest in Norway on November 19.
The misleading Facebook post: s caption claims that the person who tried to burn the Holy Quran suffered an accident, with both hands burned and in a coma.
The claim is false: as the photo actually shows a man in an Oregon hospital recovering from a rare form of the plague contracted after being bitten by a cat.
